results.title: Live Love Laugh Wall Decor, Set Of 3 Positive Quotes Wall Arts, Live Every Moment Love Beyond Words Sign, Bedroom Decor, Living Room Art
results.description:
A set of 3 prints " Live - Love - Laugh".

This listing is for a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD ONLY. Read about Etsy instant downloads here: https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949

DETAILS
You will receive JPG files in 5 sizes:
★ 24x36 for printing:
Inch > 4x6, 6x9, 8x12, 10x15, 12x18, 16x24, 20x30, 24x36
Cm > 10x15, 20x30, 30x45, 40x60, 50x75, 60x90

★ 18x24 for printing:
Inch > 6x8, 9x12, 12x16, 15x20, 18x24
Cm > 15x20, 22x30, 30x40, 38x50, 45x60

★ 16x20 for printing:
Inch > 4x5, 8x10, 12x15, 16x20
Cm > 10x12, 20x25, 24x30, 28x35, 30x38, 40x50

★ A1 for printing:
Inch > 5x7, 10x14
Cm > 50x70
Paper Sizes > A5, A4, A3, A2, A1

★ 11x14 for printing:
Inch > 11x14

WANT TO CHANGE SIZE OR COLOR?
★ Free to change to another size and color (one change request per order)
★ Please include your size and color choice in the "note to seller" when checking out. Customized files will be sent to your email within 24-48 hours after payment.

HOW TO DOWNLOAD
★ Once payment is confirmed, your files will be available to download.
★ You can also access your downloads later by going to Your Account > Purchases and reviews, look for the order and click "Download files".
★ If you checked out as a guest, you'll find a link to download your purchase in the receipt email that was sent to you after purchase.

PLEASE NOTE
★ This listing is for digital files, no physical item will be shipped
★ Due to the nature of digital products, I cannot refund but I will try my best to help you if you meet any problems with my products
★ I cannot guarantee your printer will deliver the exact colors as you see in the digital files.
★ Personal use only

PRINTING
★ We recommend our partner printing company Prints Of Love. Please copy this link to upload your files and order your prints: https://printsoflove.com/emma-doan/
★ You can also print on thick paper or heavy card stock at your home printer or local print shops like Walmart, Walgreens, Fed Ex, Office Depot, Staples or UPS stores

results.title: Live Laugh Love Copper and Stainless Steel Necklace
results.description: This necklace is made with a 1 inch copper disc. I hand-stamped Live Laugh Love along with some spirals to give some extra whimsy. To accent, there is a small stainless steel open heart attached to the copper with heavy duty rings. It comes with an 18 inch, 2x1mm stainless steel curb chain. Great unique gift for that special someone!

results.title: Live Well-Love Much-Laugh Often Inspirational Sign . Painted 3D Banner Shape Happy Sign with Sculptured Grapes . Kitchen Decor
results.description:
Live Well-Love Much-Laugh Often Inspirational Sign . Painted 3D Banner Shape Happy Sign with Sculptured Grapes . Kitchen Decor

This lovely vintage  “Live Well - Love Much - Laugh Often” painted banner-shaped inspirational sign with 3d sculptured grape design is a fabulous wall plaque or door topper.

The banner plaque measuring approximately 7-1/4" tall x 22-7/8" wide x 2-1/4" deep, weighs one pound, 10 ounces, is   is a happy, positive home decoration and in very good vintage condition

Please keep in mind that vintage items are at least 20 years old and some pieces have had quite a bit of handling resulting in some wear and tear. Many items are not in perfect condition, but rather have maintained their vintage charm. 

I do my best to make note of any defects; however, at times some minor defects might escape my eye or seem to be irrelevant to the overall beauty of the item and since beauty is in the eye of the beholder, my vintage items are sold “As Is” and are not returnable.  Please ask any questions you may have prior to making a purchase.  Thank you.

Purchase of this item confirms that you have thoroughly read the listing, noted the dimensions given, viewed all the photographs, have asked any and all questions prior to purchasing this item and understand and agree that afloralaffair does not give refunds, offer exchanges or accept returns.

Back to My Shop -

results.title: Hearts & Rose Quartz Resin and Silver Necklace, Bracelet, Earring Set - Love Charm
results.description: Hearts, Rose Quartz. Resin & Silver Necklace, Bracelet, Earring Set with Love Charm,  Necklace is 29 1/2" in length with a 2 piece pendant that dangles 2 1/4".  Pendant has a silver heart with tiny crystals and is engraved with the motto, "Live, Love, Laugh".  Light and sparkly necklace made with rose quartz colored resin tubes, facetted pink crystal beads, and silver plated square beads.  It has a heart shaped clasp.  Necklace is strung on sturdy jeweler's wire with high quality silver plated findings.  Bracelet is strung on memory wire - one size fits all - and includes silver tubes, plain and etched beads, and facetted pink crystals and has heart charms on both ends,  Earrings are made with rose quartz, crystal and silver beads and heart charms and have a 2 1/4" dangle.  Set is shipped in sturdy gold gift box, suitable for wrapping. .

results.title: Live Laugh Love Saying Rhinestone Womens Tank Top It Comes With A Removable Heart Charm Inspirational Sayings Womens Shirts
results.description:
Bella Brand Tank Top
Women's Form Fit, true to size. If in-between sizes you can go up a size.
Stretchy Fitted Ribbed Tank Top

Included with the tank top is a removable charm. There are various charm options to choose from, see all pictures! Please send me a note at checkout if you want a different charm than what is on the shirt in the picture. The charm is on a clasp that can easily be removed and switched up with your own charm making it possible for you to create your own look if you choose to do so. No charm, no problem! If you do not want a charm on your shirt or apron please let us know and we will not attach the loop for the charm.

What makes our merchandise different from everyone else's is that we design most of our patterns and then add a removable charm with each item! It makes everything we create unique. The shirts are super cute, a lot of fun to wear, and different from everyone else's! The four typical comments I get when I wear mine are, “How cute," “I love the charm," "I want one,” and “where did you get it.”

I personally hand stitch on and put together the charm details on every shirt.

All of our shirts, hats, bags, masks and aprons are made to order, which are therefore a final sale. No returns, refunds or exchanges. Please read the item's entire listing description before purchasing. If you have any questions please send me an email before you make a purchase.

Because all of our items are made to order once you place an order you cannot change or cancel the size, color or type of shirt / item unless you contact us within one hour after the order has been placed.

Thank You!

results.title: Italian Sign Live Well Laugh Often Love Much Rustic Vintage Shabby Chic Sign Extra Large
results.description:
Please order by this date. Gently distressed handmade Italian wooden sign "Vivi Bene, Ama Molto E Ridi Spesso" (Essence in translation is "Live well, laugh often love much!"

This is such a beautiful sign and would make a perfect gift for all - especially your Italian friends.

This sign would grace any home or garden setting.

A great size for displaying on a door, above a door, amidst a wall display or gently resting on a shelf or mantle - the possibilities are endless.

Gently made to order using sustainably sourced or upcycled wood.

Available in a choice of gentle colours and all resting on a coal underlay - apart from the Vintage Cream which rests far more beautifully on a cocoa underlay.

made from:
All my signs are painted with great love and care - there is no cookie cutting process here - It's just me and a huge passion for creating great words on great signs!

All my signs are made from sustainably sourced or re-claimed wood.

No two pieces are ever the same - the wood grain, knots, notches, wood shakes will all vary and each tiny detail merely adds to the authenticity of each one I create.

Layers of paint, wax, artist quality acrylic letter work and seals are applied over a number of days - my pieces are created to be loved for a long time!

Sawtooth fixings are always attached ensuring that your sign is all ready for displaying as soon as you receive it.

This sign is suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

dimensions:
This piece measures approximately 71cm x 10cm x 2cm (28 inches x 4 inches x 3/4 of an inch)

Thank you so much for looking and please take a peep at my other signs - I can usually paint whatever words you require in any language and any style.


delivery:
Your order will be gently and carefully made over a number of days (sometimes up to 10 to 14 days to make  - due to layers of paint, wax and seals!) and will be sent out with a secure signed for and fully trackable courier delivery service. Combined postage is available - please just ask before payment is made. (Two signs of this size or less can usually be sent for the same postage as for 1)

results.title: Live Love Laugh poster | Printable modern wall art
results.description:
Spruce up your home instantly with this positive affirmation to get you through your day and/or just Monday morning. Our downloadable typographic prints will add a modern and fun touch to your home. All of our artwork is proudly designed exclusively by us on the British seaside 🎡

BUNDLE DEALS!
20% off 2 prints with code IWANT2
33% off 3 prints with code IWANT3

How do digital downloads work?

*Most importantly: you will receive a link to the files to print yourself and you will not receive any artwork in the post.* To buy the print of this design and have it sent to you click here: 
https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/844363200/live-love-laugh-physical-wall-art

After your purchase, the files will be delivered electronically within minutes. You will receive 4 high resolution (300dpi) JPG files for instant download.  

How can I print the files?

-  Print using your home printer (or the one at the office as long as you don't blame us if you get caught)
-  Upload the files to an online printing service like www.shuttterfly.com (US), or www.solopress.com (UK). There are also websites that provide framing such as www.framebridge.com.
-  Support local and take/email the files to your local printers or photo shop

What size will the pictures be when I print them?

You can pick what size you like!  The files correspond to print the following sizes:

1️⃣  2:3 ratio file for printing:
Inches: 4x6, 8x12, 12x18, 16x24, 20x30, 24x36
Cm: 10x15, 20x30, 30x45, 40x60, 50x76, 60x90

2️⃣  4:5 ratio file for printing:
Inches: 4x5, 8x10, 11x14, 12x15, 16x20, 20x25, 28x35
Cm: 10x12, 20x25, 28x35, 30x38, 40x50, 50x63, 72x90

3️⃣ 3:4 ratio file for printing:
6"x8", 9"x12", 12"x16", 18"x24", 24"x32"

4️⃣  International Paper Sizes (ISO) or 5:7 ratio file for printing:
A 1, A2, A3, A4, A5, 5x7 inches, 13x18 cm

What type of paper do you recommend?

Recycled paper of course! Best to check what your printer can handle first if you are printing from home, otherwise we recommend the following in medium to heavy weight:
- Matte
- Satin
- Bond 
- Ultra-white paper

Can I return my purchase?

Unfortunately we don't accept returns on digital items so please be aware that colours my vary slightly from screen to screen. If you need any further support please don't hesitate to contact us.


For more information on downloading your files you can read Etsy's official explanation here:
https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-gb/articles/115013328108?segment=shopping

results.title: LIVE.  LAUGH.  LOVE.  Vintage silverware pendant necklace

The chain is approx 18” long, and fastens with a lobster-claw fastener.  Because it is silver-plated, it will naturally tarnish some over time.  To retain shiny finish, polish with silver cleaner.

Vintage Dog Refrigerator Magnet "Live Well, Laugh Often, Love Much" Printwick Papers Fridge Square Puppy Photo Magnets

A photo of a white dog sitting on a lawn chair with the words "Live well, laugh ofter, love much" written underneath. Dog lovers collectible fridge magnet.

Condition:
  Good vintage condition, very small nicks and scratches.

Measurements:
  3 1/2 x 2 1/2" squared

Please ask all questions before purchasing this item.

International shipping available.

All items shipped with care.
